**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 176 2.0 **Archetype** [Herbalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=62) **Prerequisites** [Herbalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1982); Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) --- During your daily preparations, you find medicinal plants endemic to your location. Until your next preparations, you can spend an additional batch of herbs to add a benefit to an item you create with your herbalism. The benefit of the special herbs affects the creature that the item is applied to; if the benefit is not immediate, it lasts for 1 minute unless otherwise stated. This adjustment counts as an [additive](/Traits.aspx?ID=4), so you can't include another additive without spoiling the item.
  • **Aquatic** Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.
  • **Arctic** For 1 hour, treat [environmental cold effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=642) as if they were one step less severe.
  • **Desert** For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.
  • **Forest** Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) and [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) effects.
  • **Mountain** Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.
  • **Plains** Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.
  • **Swamp** Remove one source of [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
  • **Underground** Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.
name: Endemic Herbs
